attributes.action: Culture, Media & Sport committee to consider governance of Rugby Football Union
attributes.additional_details: We therefore call on the House of Commons to refer the governance of the RFU to the Culture, Media and Sport Committee for its consideration.
attributes.background: I feel - along with many other English rugby fans - that the RFU needs an overhaul. We feel the Culture, Media & Sport select committee should take an interest in the decision making structures of one of this country's richest sporting organisations.
